html:
Sept 22 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Burberry, Entain and Legrand, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* AO World Plc AO.L: Davy Research starts with neutral rating

* Burberry BRBY.L: Barclays starts with equal weight rating; price target 2000p

* Compagnie Financiere Richemont SA CFR.S: Barclays starts with overweight rating

* Entain ENT.L: Peel Hunt cuts to hold from buy

* Legrand LEGD.PA: Exane BNP Paribas raises to outperform from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: Deutsche Bank cuts price target to CHF 68.80 from CHF 71.3

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: Barclays raises price target to 165p from 135p

* Alphawave IP Group Plc AWE.L: Barclays raises price target to 500p from 475p

* Alphawave IP Group Plc AWE.L: BMO raises target price to 500p from 425p

* Alstom ALSO.PA: BofA Global Research cuts price objective to EUR 25 from EUR 30

* Anglo American AAL.L: BofA Global Research cuts price objective to 3300p from 4600p

* Anglo American AAL.L: Jefferies cuts price target to 3100p from 4000p

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Jefferies cuts price target to 1900p from 2000p

* AO World Plc AO.L: Davy Research starts with neutral rating

* BHP BHPB.L: BofA Global Research cuts to neutral from buy

* BHP BHPB.L: Jefferies cuts price target to 2300p from 2550p

* Boliden AB BOL.ST: BofA Global Research cuts to neutral from buy

* Boohoo BOOH.L: Davy Research starts with outperform rating; price target 399p

* Burberry BRBY.L: Barclays starts with equal weight rating; price target 2000p

* Burberry BRBY.L: SocGen raises to buy from hold
